This project is an ultra-minimal static sports dashboard hosted on GitHub Pages. Data is fetched via GitHub Actions every 6 hours. The frontend is vanilla JS (no framework) with embedded CSS. Norwegian timezone and preferences. Key files: docs/js/dashboard.js (controller), docs/js/dashboard-helpers.js (utilities), docs/js/asset-maps.js (logos).
